markdownRemark.html:
“I will teach you what is the teaching and what is not the teaching. … And what is not the teaching? Killing living creatures … wrong view. This is called what is not the teaching.

And what is the teaching? Not killing living creatures … right view. This is called the teaching.”

AN.10.183. Āsavasutta (“Defiled”)

children.value:
“I will teach you what is the teaching and what is not the teaching. …
And what is not the teaching?
Killing living creatures …
wrong view.
This is called what is not the teaching.

And what is the teaching?
Not killing living creatures …
right view.
This is called the teaching.”
